Paul<S>3972</S> and<S>2532</S> Timotheus<S>5095</S>, the servants<S>1401</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, to all<S>3956</S> the saints<S>40</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> which are<S>5607</S> at<S>1722</S> Philippi<S>5375</S>, with<S>4862</S> the bishops<S>1985</S> and<S>2532</S> deacons<S>1249</S>:
Grace<S>5485</S> be unto you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> peace<S>1515</S>, from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
I thank<S>2168</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S> upon<S>1909</S> every<S>3956</S> remembrance<S>3417</S> of you<S>5216</S>, <sup>remembrance: or, mention</sup>
Always<S>3842</S> in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> prayer<S>1162</S> of mine<S>3450</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S> making<S>4160</S> request<S>1162</S> with<S>3326</S> joy<S>5479</S>,
For<S>1909</S> your<S>5216</S> fellowship<S>2842</S> in<S>1519</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> from<S>575</S> the first<S>4413</S> day<S>2250</S> until<S>891</S> now<S>3568</S>;
Being confident<S>3982</S> of this<S>5124</S> very thing<S>846</S>, that<S>3754</S> he which hath begun<S>1728</S> a good<S>18</S> work<S>2041</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> will perform<S>2005</S> it until<S>891</S> the day<S>2250</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: <sup>perform: or, finish</sup>
Even as<S>2531</S> it is<S>2076</S> meet<S>1342</S> for me<S>1698</S> to think<S>5426</S> this<S>5124</S> of<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>, because<S>1223</S> I have<S>2192</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3165</S> heart<S>2588</S>; inasmuch as both<S>5037</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S>, and<S>2532</S> in the defence<S>627</S> and<S>2532</S> confirmation<S>951</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S>, ye<S>5209</S> all<S>3956</S> are<S>5607</S> partakers<S>4791</S> of my<S>3450</S> grace<S>5485</S>. <sup>I have: or, ye have me in your heart</sup> <sup>of my: or, with me of grace</sup>
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> record<S>3144</S>, how<S>5613</S> greatly I long after<S>1971</S> you<S>5209</S> all<S>3956</S> in<S>1722</S> the bowels<S>4698</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>5124</S> I pray<S>4336</S>, that<S>2443</S> your<S>5216</S> love<S>26</S> may abound<S>4052</S> yet<S>2089</S> more<S>3123</S> and<S>2532</S> more<S>3123</S> in<S>1722</S> knowledge<S>1922</S> and<S>2532</S> in all<S>3956</S> judgment<S>144</S>; <sup>judgment: or, sense</sup>
That<S>1519</S> ye<S>5209</S> may approve<S>1381</S> things that are excellent<S>1308</S>; that<S>2443</S> ye may be<S>5600</S> sincere<S>1506</S> and<S>2532</S> without offence<S>677</S> till<S>1519</S> the day<S>2250</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>; <sup>approve: or, try</sup> <sup>are: or, differ</sup>
Being filled<S>4137</S> with the fruits<S>2590</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S>, which<S>3588</S> are by<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, unto<S>1519</S> the glory<S>1391</S> and<S>2532</S> praise<S>1868</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I would<S>1014</S> ye<S>5209</S> should understand<S>1097</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>3754</S> the things which happened unto<S>2596</S> me<S>1691</S> have fallen out<S>2064</S> rather<S>3123</S> unto<S>1519</S> the furtherance<S>4297</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S>;
So that<S>5620</S> my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> are<S>1096</S> manifest<S>5318</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> the palace<S>4232</S>, and<S>2532</S> in all<S>3956</S> other<S>3062</S> places; <sup>in Christ: or, for Christ</sup> <sup>the palace: or, Csar's court</sup> <sup>in all other: or, to all others</sup>
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4119</S> of the brethren<S>80</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, waxing confident<S>3982</S> by my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S>, are much more<S>4056</S> bold<S>5111</S> to speak<S>2980</S> the word<S>3056</S> without fear<S>870</S>.
Some<S>5100</S> indeed<S>3303</S> preach<S>2784</S> Christ<S>5547</S> even<S>2532</S> of<S>1223</S> envy<S>5355</S> and<S>2532</S> strife<S>2054</S>; and<S>1161</S> some<S>5100</S> also<S>2532</S> of<S>1223</S> good will<S>2107</S>:
The one<S>3303</S> preach<S>2605</S> Christ<S>5547</S> of<S>1537</S> contention<S>2052</S>, not<S>3756</S> sincerely<S>55</S>, supposing<S>3633</S> to add<S>2018</S> affliction<S>2347</S> to my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S>:
But<S>1161</S> the other of<S>1537</S> love<S>26</S>, knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> I am set<S>2749</S> for<S>1519</S> the defence<S>627</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S>.
What<S>5101</S> then<S>1063</S>? notwithstanding<S>4133</S>, every<S>3956</S> way<S>5158</S>, whether<S>1535</S> in pretence<S>4392</S>, or<S>1535</S> in truth<S>225</S>, Christ<S>5547</S> is preached<S>2605</S>; and<S>2532</S> I<S>5463</S> therein<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> do rejoice<S>5463</S>, yea<S>235</S>, and<S>2532</S> will rejoice<S>5463</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> this<S>5124</S> shall turn<S>576</S> to<S>1519</S> my<S>3427</S> salvation<S>4991</S> through<S>1223</S> your<S>5216</S> prayer<S>1162</S>, and<S>2532</S> the supply<S>2024</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>,
According<S>2596</S> to my<S>3450</S> earnest expectation<S>603</S> and<S>2532</S> my hope<S>1680</S>, that<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> nothing<S>3762</S> I shall be ashamed<S>153</S>, but<S>235</S> that with<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> boldness<S>3954</S>, as<S>5613</S> always<S>3842</S>, so now<S>3568</S> also<S>2532</S> Christ<S>5547</S> shall be magnified<S>3170</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> body<S>4983</S>, whether<S>1535</S> it be by<S>1223</S> life<S>2222</S>, or<S>1535</S> by<S>1223</S> death<S>2288</S>.
For<S>1063</S> to me<S>1698</S> to live<S>2198</S> is Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> to die<S>599</S> is gain<S>2771</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> I live<S>2198</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>, this<S>5124</S> is the fruit<S>2590</S> of my labour<S>2041</S> <S>3427</S>: yet<S>2532</S> what<S>5101</S> I shall choose<S>138</S> I wot<S>1107</S> not<S>3756</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I am in a strait<S>4912</S> betwixt<S>1537</S> two<S>1417</S>, having<S>2192</S> a desire<S>1939</S> to<S>1519</S> depart<S>360</S>, and<S>2532</S> to be<S>1511</S> with<S>4862</S> Christ<S>5547</S>; which is far<S>4183</S> <S>3123</S> better<S>2908</S>:
Nevertheless<S>1161</S> to abide<S>1961</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S> is more needful<S>316</S> for<S>1223</S> you<S>5209</S>.
And<S>2532</S> having this<S>5124</S> confidence<S>3982</S>, I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> I shall abide<S>3306</S> and<S>2532</S> continue<S>4839</S> with you<S>5213</S> all<S>3956</S> for<S>1519</S> your<S>5216</S> furtherance<S>4297</S> and<S>2532</S> joy<S>5479</S> of faith<S>4102</S>;
That<S>2443</S> your<S>5216</S> rejoicing<S>2745</S> may be more abundant<S>4052</S> in<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> for<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S> by<S>1223</S> my<S>1699</S> coming<S>3952</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> again<S>3825</S>.
Only<S>3440</S> let your conversation be<S>4176</S> as it becometh<S>516</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>: that<S>2443</S> whether<S>1535</S> I come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>1492</S> you<S>5209</S>, or<S>1535</S> else be absent<S>548</S>, I may hear<S>191</S> of your<S>5216</S> affairs<S>4012</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye stand fast<S>4739</S> in<S>1722</S> one<S>1520</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, with one<S>3391</S> mind<S>5590</S> striving together<S>4866</S> for the faith<S>4102</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S>;
And<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> nothing<S>3367</S> <S>3361</S> terrified<S>4426</S> by<S>5259</S> your adversaries<S>480</S>: which<S>3748</S> is<S>2076</S> to them<S>846</S> <S>3303</S> an evident token<S>1732</S> of perdition<S>684</S>, but<S>1161</S> to you<S>5213</S> of salvation<S>4991</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>5124</S> of<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>3754</S> unto you<S>5213</S> it is given<S>5483</S> in the behalf<S>5228</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> to believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> to suffer<S>3958</S> for<S>5228</S> his sake<S>846</S> <S>5228</S>;
Having<S>2192</S> the same<S>846</S> conflict<S>73</S> which<S>3634</S> ye saw<S>1492</S> <S>1492</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>, and<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> hear<S>191</S> to be in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>.
